Post.title: Ubuntu
Post._content:
### [oh-my-zsh](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh)
```
sudo apt-get install zsh git
sudo shutdown -r now
zsh --version
git clone git://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh.git ~/.oh-my-zsh
cp ~/.zshrc ~/.zshrc.orig
cp ~/.oh-my-zsh/templates/zshrc.zsh-template ~/.zshrc
chsh -s /bin/zsh
```

### [autojump](https://github.com/wting/autojump)
```
git clone git://github.com/joelthelion/autojump.git ~/.autojump 
cd .autojump
python install.py
~/.zshrc/.bash_profile
[[ -s $HOME/.autojump/etc/profile.d/autojump.sh ]] && source $HOME/.autojump/etc/profile.d/autojump.sh
autoload -U compinit && compinit -u
```

### [rvm](https://github.com/rvm/rvm)
```
curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable

gpg --keyserver hkp://keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 409B6B1796C275462A1703113804BB82D39DC0E3

curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable

source /home/tustar/.rvm/scripts/rvm
~/.zshrc/.bash_profile
export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.rvm/bin"
```

### [ruby](https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/)
```
rvm install ruby
```

###  [rubygems](https://rubygems.org/)
```
sudo-get install gem

gem sources

gem sources -r url

gem sources -a http://ruby.taobao.org/

gem sources -u
```

### [repo](https://dl-ssl.google.com/dl/googlesource/git-repo/repo)
```
mkdir ~/.repo
curl "http://php.webtutor.pl/en/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/repo" > /.repo/repo
~/.zshrc/.bash_profile
#Repo
export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.repo/repo"
```

### [gradle](http://www.gradle.org)
```
sudo apt-get remove gradle
 http://www.gradle.org/downloads
sudo unzip gradle-2.6-all.zip -d ~/.gradle
~/.zshrc/.bash_profile
#Gradle
export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.gradle/gradle-2.7/bin"
```

### [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/)
```
https://nodejs.org/en/node-v4.1.1-linux-x64.tar.gz
tar -xzvf  node-v4.1.1-linux-x64.tar.gz 
mv node-v4.1.1-linux-x64 ~/.node
~/.zshrc/.bash_profile
#NodeJS
export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.node/bin"
```

### [jekyll](http://jekyllcn.com/)
```
gem install therubyracer
gem install jekyll-sitemap
gem install jekyll
```

### [sqlite3](http://www.sqlite.org/)
```

sudo apt-get install sqlite3

sudo apt-get install sqlitebrowser
sudo apt-get install  sqliteman
```

### 
```
sudo apt-get install ant
sudo apt-get install python
sudo apt-get tree
```

### 
+ [ubuntu 14.04on my zsh](http://blog.csdn.net/eclipse_c/article/details/38801549)
+ [Rubygem(gem sources)](http://jingyan.baidu.com/article/4853e1e51c770f1909f726fe.html)
+ [UbuntuGradle](http://blog.csdn.net/stwstw0123/article/details/47809189)
+ [UbuntuSublime Text 3](http://jingyan.baidu.com/article/f3ad7d0ff8731609c3345b3b.html)
+ [unbuturepo](http://yinger-fei.iteye.com/blog/1300144)

### [oh-my-zsh](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh)
```
sudo apt-get install zsh git
sudo shutdown -r now
zsh --version
git clone git://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh.git ~/.oh-my-zsh
cp ~/.zshrc ~/.zshrc.orig
cp ~/.oh-my-zsh/templates/zshrc.zsh-template ~/.zshrc
chsh -s /bin/zsh
```

### [autojump](https://github.com/wting/autojump)
```
git clone git://github.com/joelthelion/autojump.git ~/.autojump 
cd .autojump
python install.py
~/.zshrc/.bash_profile
[[ -s $HOME/.autojump/etc/profile.d/autojump.sh ]] && source $HOME/.autojump/etc/profile.d/autojump.sh
autoload -U compinit && compinit -u
```

#### 

+ 

  |         |  ()          |
  | ------------ |:-------------:|
  | ldpi         | 36*36       |
  | mdpi         | 48*48       |
  | hdpi         | 72*72       |
  | xhdpi        | 96*96       |
  | xxhdpi       | 144*144     |
  | web          | 512*512     |

+ 

  + [](http://developer.android.com/design/style/iconography.html)Google

  + ****

  + RGB565

 + 

  + png

  + 

    +  _n(normal), _p(pressed), _ddisable

      ```
        fresh_ic_tab_home_n.png
        fresh_ic_tab_home_p.png
        fresh_ic_navi_back_n.png
        fresh_ic_navi_back_p.png
        ```
    + 

      | Asset Type     |Prefix          | Example           |
      | --------------- |:------------------:|:-----------------:|
      | Icons     |ic_      | ic_star.png   |
      | Launcher    |ic_launcher  | ic_launcher_calendar.png   |
      | Menu      |ic_menu    | ic_menu_archive.png   |
      | Status bar  |ic_stat_notify | ic_stat_notify_msg.png  |
      | Tab icons   |ic_tab     | ic_tab_recent.png   |
      | Dialog icons  |ic_dialog    | ic_dialog_info.png   |
